Source.Name: python-backports
Source.Description:
The backports namespace is a namespace reserved for features backported from the Python standard library to older versions of Python 2.
Packages that exist in the backports namespace should not provide their own backports/__init__.py, but instead require this package.

Package.Name: python-backports
Package.Description:
